resources.string: OK
Cancel
The \"mandatory\" attribute \"fragment manager\" must be assigned.
The \"mandatory\" attribute \"seek bar change listener\" must be assigned.
The number of elements in the \"value array\" and the \"label array\" must be the same.
The value must be a position index in the \"value array\".
The \"value array\" is missing.
The mandatory attribute \"%1$s\" is missing.
Could not instantiate \"tha float seek bar\" object because its corresponding \"xml-drawable\" could not be loaded.
The minimum and maximum values cannot be the same and the minimum value cannot be greater than the maximum value.

The \"default value\" must not be less than the minimum value or greater than the maximum value and the difference between the default and minimum value should be equally divisible by the value increment.
The increment must be greater than zero and the difference between the maximum and minimum values should be equally divisible by the increment.
The value must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
The \"value array\" should be an array of floats.
The \"default value\" is missing.
Could not instantiate \"the label seek bar\" object because its corresponding \"xml-drawable\" could not be loaded.
The number of selectable labels must be at least 2.
The \"default value\" must not be less than 0 or greater than the number of selectable labels - 1.
The value must be a position index in the \"label array\".
The mandatory attribute \"%1$s\" is missing.
The mandatory attribute \"%1$s\" is missing.
The \"mandatory\" attribute \"click listener\" must be assigned.
The specified size \"%1$s\" doesn\'t match the regular expression \"%2$s\".
